target.name: clean
target.description: Remove all products of this build file.

echo.message: Removing both java/build, java/dist and java/testbuild.
Deprecated, consider using a more specific clean target, such as clean-dist or clean-build

target.name: clean-dist
target.description: Remove all products of this build file.

target.name: clean-build
target.description: Remove all products of this build file.

target.name: clean-test
target.description: Remove all built test products of this build file.

target.name: clean_src
target.description: Remove source directory. E.g. to prepare for clean checkout.

mkdir.description: Directory for built stuff (i.e. to be jarred)
Directory for built stuff (i.e. to be jarred)

target.name: compile_all
target.description: Run the compile_all task in every direct subdirectory that contains a build.xml file.

target.name: cvs-checkout
target.description: interface to ant libraries' version of checkout

target.name: cvs-checkout-jadebuildfile
target.description: Checkout of CVS the files needed to build JADE.

target.name: cvs-checkout-jvizbuildfile
target.description: Checkout of CVS the files needed to build JViz.

target.name: cvs-checkout-keystore
target.description: Checkout of CVS the keystore used for signing JAR files.

target.name: shield-dist
target.depends: util-dist, jade-dist, jade-dist-core, atec-jade-dist, didss-dist, dsserver-dist, jobqueue2-dist, mdv-dist, util-dist, util118-dist
